an11.13:3.3: adhiṭṭhāsi → adhiṭṭhāya (sya-all); adhiṭṭhāti (mr) | labhi → lacchati (sya-all, mr)
an11.13:10.2: kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānaṃ → kabaliṅkārāhārabhakkhānaṃ (bj); kabaliṅkārabhakkhānaṃ (si); kabaḷīkārabhakkhānaṃ (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
an11.13:11.2: nikkujjo → nikujjo (mr) | paccāvamati → pacchā vamati (bj); paccāmasati (sya-all)
